title.en: Heroine na no ni, Ikemen Idol ni ♂ Narimashita!?

altTitles.ja: ヒロインなのに、イケメンアイドル♂になりました!?

altTitles.en: Why Did I Transform Into a Handsome Idol ♂ Even Though I’m the Heroine?!

description.en:
“Even if it’s just a little bit, I want to change.”

Rion is a timid girl who has always followed the herd, caring about other people’s opinions to the point where she couldn’t speak her own thoughts out loud. One day, sick of it all, she forces herself to attend the idol group “PRINCE・Kiss” handshake event, where she meets Kanata, whom she admires and whose words give Rion even more courage to change her timid self.

Determined to change and get closer to Kanata, she decides to pursue her dream of becoming an idol. However, on the day of the audition, Rion encounters Sakyo, a member of Kanata’s group, and due to an unexpected incident between them, her body transforms into that of a male?!

To make matters even more complicated, Rion ends up participating in a boys' idol audition instead…?
A new type of idol love story begins with this unique twist!

links.amz: https://www.amazon.co.jp/ヒロインなのに、イケメンアイドル♂になりました-1-フラワーコミックス-愛染-マナ/dp/4098727595
